skillRows.name: Snip☆Magic
skillRows.description:
ELF has two forms of Basic ATK:
Basic ATK 1: Use scissors to snip twice each dealing 300% ATK of Fire DMG.
Basic ATK 2: Spin scissors to deal 150% ATK of Fire DMG 4 times.
ATK Interval: 3.3s

skillRows.name: Heat Up
skillRows.description: ELF restores 2.0 SP per second in battle.

skillRows.name: Fire Mark
skillRows.description: ELF's Basic ATKs boost her Total DMG by 50.0% on hit for 10s.

skillRows.name: Shackle☆Magic
skillRows.description:
ELF casts a spell at the target location to create a magic field that ignites, immobilizes enemies within and explodes with a 2.5s delay dealing 3 x 700% + 1800% ATK of Fire DMG throughout the duration. Enemies within the field take 10.0% bonus Fire DMG for 13s. Restores 200 HP for all Valkyries.
CD: 35s
SP: 75

skillRows.name: Cube of Conviction
skillRows.description: ELF's Ultimate deals 60.0% bonus Fire DMG.

skillRows.name: Fire of Blessings
skillRows.description: The HP regen max charges from ELF's Ultimate increase to 25.0.

skillRows.name: Sweet☆Magic
skillRows.description: After Elf's Ultimate is cast, team obtains 20 charges of HP regen. Any team member whose HP is below 100% consumes 1 charge to restore 60 HP when she hits an enemy.

skillRows.name: Caramel Pudding
skillRows.description: ELF restores 20.0% more HP for Valkyries whose HP is below 50%.

skillRows.name: Choc Lava Cake
skillRows.description: [Lineup] ELF's Ultimate makes enemies take 15.0% bonus Fire DMG instead when there are 2 or more Fire DMG dealers on the team.

skillRows.name: Double Sugar
skillRows.description: [Lineup] When team leader is a Fire DMG dealer, team deals 10.0% bonus Fire DMG.

skillRows.name: Friendship☆Magic
skillRows.description: When a Valkyrie uses a weapon skill, ELF summons a black hole to fire 6 magic missiles each dealing 140% ATK of Fire DMG. CD: 15s.

skillRows.name: Sirin's Help
skillRows.description: Enemies hit by ELF's Joint ATKs take 10.0% bonus shield DMG for 12s.

skillRows.name: Sirin's Support
skillRows.description: Joint ATK's cooldown is reduced to 10.0s

skillRows.name: Sirin's Regard
skillRows.description: Joint ATKs deal 200.0% bonus DMG to enemies or their shields which take fixed DMG.
